name: The Seven Digits
description:
The Seven Digits

You're woken up in a room. All you can see is just a table with a computer.

Try to not die before clock shows 00:00:00! Or try to win the MAIN PRIZE!

Made for Godot Wild Jam #32.

Used cards: Dare to fail
